name: TnT (Paul)
description:
Tap and tilt your way to the top.

Did your friend score 200? well you better score 201!!!

"Cool game" - Random person

"Best game that I've ever played" - Said no one ever

"These are just quotes of nonsense" - That may be true

"I'm leaving you" - Ex Girlfriend

So you've seen the testimonies that don't exist so try it out for yourself.

If you would prefer to install from Google Play that's cool too I suppose.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

For iOS follow here:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/t-n-t/id1234393836...

Any and all feedback welcome.
